short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates UBI verification Process, Update Class/Category wise Enrolment (on website) in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon has been developed to 
1. Help PGT-CS of Kendriya Vidyalayas in the process of fee verification.
2. Help in Updating Class/ Category wise Enrolment (on website) in one click


You can disable or enable this extension by pinning the extension and clicking the icon

After Installing this addon in your Google Chrome the processes of checking the students during fee verification will be automated and the button "Verify Selected Students" will be clicked automatically.

The system will stop on popup. 
To continue with the verification process click "OK"
To deny the verification click "Cancel"

If you click "OK"
Next list of students will appear and they will be checked automatically with clicking of "verify Selected Students" Button

The process continues until all the students are verified.

This addon also autofill the captcha present on UBI fee protal and UBI fee receipt portal

This addon also fills the mobile and email address on fee receipt portal


To  Update Class/ Category wise Enrolment (on website) in one click,
1. Pin the extension
2. click on extension icon
3. Go to website tab
4. download template excel file, prepare data, and follow the instructions
